headline: A Chubb/AIG Deal Could Be Good for Shareholders and a Coup for Greenberg Family
summary: Both stocks have rallied since Wednesday, when Insurance Insider US, an industry publication, wrote that the larger Chubb had made an “informal takeover approach” to AIG.  AIG stock is up over 10% since the report, closing Friday at $84.90.  Chubb has gained 4% to $308.47 since Wednesday, including a gain of 1.1% Friday.
